pos_rule_str: self.cam_motion.up_cam and self.cam_motion.camera_movement in ['major_simple'] and self.cam_motion.check_if_no_motion_cam_frame(exclude=['up_down']) and self.cam_motion.steadiness not in ['unsteady','very_unsteady']

hard_neg_rule_str.tilting_up: self.cam_motion.camera_movement in ['major_simple'] and self.cam_motion.camera_up_down_cam_frame != 'up' and self.cam_motion.camera_tilt == 'up'
hard_neg_rule_str.compound_motion_with_up: self.cam_motion.camera_movement in ['major_simple'] and self.cam_motion.camera_up_down_cam_frame == 'up' and not self.cam_motion.check_if_no_motion_cam_frame(exclude=['up_down'])
